verses.text: Tzin xajanej Jehová, yujto ix yab' in lesal ayic ix in tewi t'ay.
Yujto ix yab' tas ix in k'an t'ay, yuj chi' ol wal in b'a t'ay yacb'an pitzan into.
Ijan wal ix in yamchaj yuj chamel. Ix ja syaelal chamel t'ayin. Ha ilk'olal yet' yaelal ix jawi t'a wib'anh.
Ichato chi' ix walan in b'ha t'a Jehová. Ix in tewi t'ay yic syak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
Ha Jehová, tojol toni, tz'ok' sk'ol t'ayonh. Ha ko Diosal, yelxo wal te niwan swach'k'olal.
Ha stanhwan heb' emnaquil yeq'ui. Ayic toxo ix el wip, a ix in colani.
Ayxo in junk'olal ticnaik swab'i, yujto a Jehová wach' ix yutej sk'ol t'ayin.
Maj in scha chamlaj, ix in scol t'a in cusk'olal, maj in schalaj telwoc.
Yacb'an pitzan into ol in k'anab'ajej.
Ix wak'och Jehová yipoc in k'ool, t'a skal in niwan yaelal ix walani: Te ya ayin, xin chi.
Manhxo animaoc waj swab'i, yuj chi' ix wala' to masanil heb' anima, max yal-laj kak'anoch tas syal heb' yipoc ko k'ool.
¿Tas ol wutej wak'an spak masanil swach'k'olal Jehová ix yak' t'ayin?
Ol wik'cot wino ofrendail t'ay yuj wak'an yuj diosal t'ay, yujto ix in scolo'.
Ha t'a yichanh masanil schonhab' ol wak'elk'och tas ix wal t'ay.
Te niwan yelk'och t'a yichanh Jehová ayic scham junok mach yicxo.
Mamin Jehová, a in ton tik, a chekab' in. Ha ach ix in a coleli, yuj chi' libre in ticnaik.
Ol wak' in silab' yuj ak'oj yuj diosal t'ayach yuj spacoc a wach'k'olal. Ol wal in b'a t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, ol wak'elk'och in ti' t'ayach t'a yichanh masanil heb' a chonhab',
t'a yamaq'uil a templo t'a snanhal chonhab' Jerusalén. Scal wach' lolonel t'ayach Jehová.
